content.description: Start on jug sidepulls and climb the flake to the 'faux' top out.
content.location: Located on left side of the area where a large section of rock has broken away from the cliff.

content.description: Start on block to the right of prow, same as Intersectionality. Climb left under belly feature and straight up prow, Finish on block jugs at top of prow. Flake at base of cliff under the prow is off.
content.location: Starts just to the right of prow feature.

content.description: Start on block jug, traverse left under belly feature. Continue through sidepulls on smeary feet. Climb lay back feature making big move to finish jug. Flake at the base of the cliff under the prow is off.
content.location: Starts just to the right of prow feature visible from trail.

content.description: Stand start slab walk up good feet to gain side pulls and finish on flat jug.
content.location: Located to right of Asymptomatic, far right of area.

content.description: Start on two parallel sidepulls.  Climb up and right on good holds until you get to a reachy move to a good crimp and a high foot in a blanker section of the wall.  Finish straight up through blocky jugs to a jug directly under the roof.
content.location: Start is about 5 feet right of the obvious Unnamed V0 flake.

content.description: Stand start on jugs climb straight up and finish on jug.
content.location: Just to the left of prow feature, same finish as Intersectionality.

content.description: A fun traverse with good movement and a variety of holds. Start on jug side pulls, move right to slanted crimps with low smeary feet, up to a series of slopers, into a side pull to move around the small prow. Move right to "top out" on the starting hold for Bracken.
content.location: Same start as Unnamed, finish where Bracken starts.

content.description: Start on block left of prow. Climb right through sidepulls and good feet. Traverse out right and finish on flat jug.
content.location: Located on the left side of the slab as you approach from the trail.

content.description: Section of exposed cliff protected by a small roof. Rock is fairly solid not much choss, similar to the Overpass Area.
